name: Topple! (Frozen Spirit)
description:
A game made for the GMTK 2022 game jam. Stack dice as randomly rolled complications change the game with different types of dice or harder placements.

SOUND WARNING. I've had issues adjusting the sound to a suitable amount for different people so start on low volume preferably. 

Credit:

Music was from open game art done by Trevor Lentz.

For more of their music you can follow them on Spotify
